definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
Sanjiang ecological tourist area in Wenchuan county 汶川县, northwest Sichuan
pinyin: San1 jiang1 sheng1 tai4 lu:3 you2 qu1

sentences.english: This paper examines a new concept of community-based tourism(CBET) that originated in foreign country.
sentences.chinese: 本文引入了国外基于社区的生态旅游这一新发展理念。

sentences.english: Do you think that ecotourism is the same as nature-based tourism?
sentences.chinese: 你认为生态旅游等同于自然旅游吗？

sentences.english: At present, Eco-tourism is in full swing all over the country.
sentences.chinese: 当前，生态旅游正如火如荼地在各地开展。

sentences.english: It combines the sustainable resort and eco-tourism.
sentences.chinese: 成功地结合可持续度假和生态旅游。

sentences.english: Moreover, the water ecological tourist sources are well worth developing.
sentences.chinese: 另外，浮梁县水上生态旅游资源也值得大力开发。

sentences.english: The fifth chapter discusses the development strategies of eco-tourism in Shaya County.
sentences.chinese: 第五章为沙雅县胡杨生态旅游的开发战略。

sentences.english: Huanglong is developing Eco-tourism in a sustainable way.
sentences.chinese: 黄龙正在走一条可持续发展的战略生态旅游之路。

sentences.english: The ecological tour programming is very important part of the ecological sample region programming.
sentences.chinese: 生态旅游规划是生态示范区规划的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: However, many people have little knowledge about eco-tourism of Lijiang.
sentences.chinese: 但是许多人缺乏对丽江生态旅游的了解。

sentences.english: Fuyang, history and culture unique ecological tourism.
sentences.chinese: 阜阳历史文化悠久，生态旅游环境独特。

sentences.english: Natural resource management can be utilized as a specialized tool for the development of eco-tourism.
sentences.chinese: 加强自然资源管理是开发生态旅游的一种很好的方式。

sentences.english: We will also develop railway travel routes and ecological travel routes.
sentences.chinese: 我们也将发展火车旅游路线和生态旅游路线。

sentences.english: Then, eco-tourism is the best choice to be fit for the development.
sentences.chinese: 因此生态旅游是适应这种发展的最佳选择。

sentences.english: Finally, some measures are proposed to the development of ecotourism in Huangshan City.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对黄山市生态旅游开发提出几点建议。

sentences.english: Ecotourist development is the travel form of a kind of burgeoning higher level.
sentences.chinese: 生态旅游是一种新兴的较高层次的旅游形式。

sentences.english: The East TianMo Mountain is one important ecology scene of Zhejiang province.
sentences.chinese: 东天目山是浙江省正在开发的生态旅游重要景点之一。

definition: red tourism, focused on sites in China associated with the Communist Revolution

pinyin: guo2 jia1 lu:3 you2 du4 jia4 qu1
